name: prompt-compiler
title: Prompt Compiler
description: BYOK multi-provider command to translate any language into polished English and an LLM-ready prompt.
author: dishangyijiao

preferences.name: provider
preferences.title: API / Model
preferences.description: Select the provider, then paste that provider's API key below.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Paste the API key for the provider above. DeepSeek: platform.deepseek.com; Kimi: platform.moonshot.cn; OpenAI: platform.openai.com; Anthropic: console.anthropic.com; Gemini: aistudio.google.com.

preferences.name: model
preferences.title: Model (optional)
preferences.description: Leave empty to use default. Override to use a different model (e.g. gpt-4o, claude-3-opus).

commands.name: index
commands.title: Compile Prompt
commands.description: Paste or select text, then generate translation, optimized prompt, or both and copy to clipboard.
